===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=きもの|着|tr1=ki|pos1=the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|着る|tr=kiru||to wear on the upper body}}|物|tr2=mono|t2=thing}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|きもの|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きもの}}

# a [[kimono]]

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|着物地|きものじ}}: kimono [[cloth]]
* {{ja-r|着物姿|きもの すがた}}: one's [[appearance]] in a kimono, how one [[look]]s while wearing a kimono
* {{ja-r|着物道楽|きもの どうらく}}: [[wear]]ing many different kimono for [[fun]], as a [[diversion]] or [[hobby]]
{{der-bottom}}
